about_the_game:
FEATURES

  • Argue with Rubber Duck

  • Drown Dad

  • Drink Wine

  • Drink Poison

  • Flood Bathroom

  • Chat with Death

  • Find Your Very Own Ending

WHAT’S PSYCHOTIC BATHTUB?

Sit in your bathtub and experience your very own psychotic episode. Interact with the environment and find a way out of the really scary parts of your mind. 

50% OF PSYCHOTIC’S FINAL PROFIT WILL BE DONATED

Psychotic Bathtub shows a fictional disorder that follows psychotic symptoms. Psychotic is intended to destigmatize mental health disorders and to make them accessible. 50% of it’s final profit will be donated to mental health related projects.

content_descriptors.notes: «Psychotic Bathtub» addresses themes like death, suicide, self-destruction, intrusive thoughts, guilt and escapism.

name: Psychotic Bathtub Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Psychotic Bathtub draws attention to mental illness, is powerful yet funny and respectful. It is a testament to the power of games to promote awareness and empathy”
WINGS
short_description: Have a psychotic episode in your bathtub. Argue with a rubber duck, flood your bathroom and drown dad. Find your very own ending – or all of them.
